channel.title: Windows on Miles Hilliard
channel.description: Recent content in Windows on Miles Hilliard

item.title: Upgrade to Windows 11 Even If Your PC is "Unsupported" - Secure Boot is NOT Required!
item.description: Although I much prefer Linux, I do need Microsoft Windows for Fusion 360 along with a few other windows-only softwares. Fusion 360 will be no longer supporting Windows 10, so I figured an upgrade was in store, however, I was met with some requirement deficiencies according to Microsoft: These requirements were instated just for Windows 11, as Windows 10 (and previous versions) still have no mention of these necessities.
